page.title: 12Local news of the area.
page.content: Once a year{Grandtully School}have a Sports Day.It is usually held on the recreation field.This year there are three teams and the names of the teams are of special subjects.It is usually on a Wednesday afternoon. Every year a{bonfire night}is held in the park.The bonfire is lit at 7.30p.m and the fireworks are set off at 8 o'clock.There are hamburgers and soup for sale.Later there is a disco in the hall and there is apple ducking and a turnip lantern competition. On Saturdays,Mondays and Wednesdays the{Bowling Club}meet.It starts at 7p.m. and finishes at 9p.m. If you are a member you don't have to go every night but you can choose which nights you go.The club have tournaments as well where people from different bowling clubs come to play.
